file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 34-27-03-07 - DUAL IRS - FAN - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL DUAL IRS - FAN - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH DUAL IRS 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to clean the filter of the Inertial Reference Unit (IRU) fans. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH DUAL DUAL IRU MOUNTING TRAY FAN FILTER 34-27-03-100-801-A ♦ IRS - CLEANING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 34-27-03 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-27-03-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH DUAL IRS 2. DUAL IRU MOUNTING TRAY FAN FILTER - CLEANING A. General (1) The IRU fans are installed on the side of the IRU mounting tray, in the electronic compartment. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL S.B.145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113CZ Electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Platform To help the access to the fan filter 1 F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On aircraft PRE-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) On aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, install the safety pin of the NLG door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 34-27-03 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) On the circuit breaker panel, open the IRS 1/2 circuit breakers and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them. (4) Open 113CZ access panel to get access to the IRU fans. (5) Get access to the filter of the fan installed on the side of the IRU mounting tray. J. Clean Dual IRU Mounting Tray Fan Filter (Figure 701) SUBTASK 140-002-A (1) Hold and click out the cover of the fan filter to remove it from the fan case. (2) Clean the spongy filter with dry compressed air. NOTE: If necessary, replace the filter. (3) Position the cleaned filter in the fan case. (4) Push in the filter to install it in the fan case. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access panel 113CZ. (2) On aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, remove the safety pin of the NLG door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (3) On the circuit breaker panel, close the IRS 1/2 circuit breakers and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them.
